head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BANK SHEIRR, CAROLINE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BANK SHEIRR, CAROLINE

block.p: BANK SHEIRR-Caroline. On May 20, 1998. Devoted wife of the late Samuel Sheirr and the late Robert Bank. Loving mother of Bruce Sheirr and the late Mark James Sheirr. Beloved grandmother of Valerie, Claudia, Suzanne and Kenneth. Proud great-grandmother of Jordan and Julia. Graveside service May 21, 11 AM, Mt. Moriah Cemetery, Fairview, New Jersey.
